events.title: British Museum Tour with Private Guide
events.description:
A tour of the **British Museum** with a private guide. Meet your guide, **Gary**, in the Hilton Kensington Lobby at 9am.
      
After the tour, we all arrange for lunch and return back to the hotel

speakers.name: Nick Puntikov
speakers.title: CEO
speakers.bio: Nick Puntikov has over 20 years of experience in technology.

speakers.name: James Taylor
speakers.bio: James Taylor, M.B.A. F.R.S.A. is an award-winning speaker and internationally recognized leader in creativity and innovation. For over 20 years, he has been teaching entrepreneurs how to build innovative organizations and design the creative life the desire.

speakers.bio: Dr. Q. Grill specializes in cloud-based infrastructure and solutions.

announcements.content: Greetings all, you are invited to join us for the Welcome Reception at the Castle (100 Holland Park Avenue, London Greater, London W11 4UA0 at 18:00. We hope tp see you there
Please join us in the Gunnel Suite tomorrow morning by 8:45 as the presentations begin promptly at 9:00
Please join us in the Gunnel Suite tomorrow morning by 8:45 as the presentations begin promptly at 9:00
Please meet in the lobby by 17:20 for dinner at the Tower of London. The busses are leaving promptly at 17:30

socialFeed.content: Excited to be attending the AI Summit in London!

information:
### **Welcome!**
  
  It is our pleasure to welcome you. We are excited that you could join us here to network, attend educational sessions and enjoy our hospitality.
  
  We look forward to seeing you in the days ahead and wish you the best as you experience the planned events.
  ###
  ### **Quick Details**
  * **Location**: Hilton Kensington
  * **Address**: [179-199 Holland Park Avenue, London W11 4UL](https://maps.app.goo.gl/JsQqMUpMTLWrvfT69?g_st=com.google.maps.preview.copy)
  * **Website**: [www.firstlinesoftware.com/summit](https://firstlinesoftware.com/summit/welcome/)

  Breakfast will be served every morning in the WestEleven Restaurant (07:00 to 11:00)
  ###
  ### **How to use this app**
  This app is designed to help you enjoy the summit and be efficient communication tool. View daily events, connect with others, post photos and stay informed.
  
  Thank you for coming and we hope this app makes your experience memorable.
